footnotes.text:
1Gilbert Turnbull wrote the body of the letter, the first closing, and signed his name.
                  Abner C. Harding wrote the second closing and signed his name.

2Benjamin Bond received the appointment and held the job until 1853.  In March 1849,
                  Abraham Lincoln wrote several letters soliciting government officials on Bondâ€™s behalf,
